content: Apple is finally paying out its $50 million settlement over MacBook's defective butterfly keyboards. Customers who bought a new MacBook, MacBook Air, or MacBook Pro from 2015 to 2019 have started receiving checks of up to $395.
summary: Apple is finally paying out its $50 million settlement over MacBook's defective butterfly keyboards. Customers who bought a new MacBook, MacBook Air, or MacBook Pro from 2015 to 2019 have started receiving checks of up to $395.
